thread.title: The best reactions to the biggest Oscars f*ck up of all time
thread.title_full: The best reactions to the biggest Oscars f*ck up of all time

author: Laura Vitto
title: The best reactions to the biggest Oscars f*ck up of all time
text:
The best reactions to the biggest Oscars f*ck up of all time 37 Faye Dunaway and Warren Beatty speak onstage. Image: Getty Images By Laura Vitto 2017-02-27 05:31:19 UTC 
For about a minute there, it seemed that La La Land had won Best Picture at the 2017 Oscars. 
But in what is probably the biggest screw up in Oscars history, due to an envelope mix-up, Best Picture presenters Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway announced the incorrect winner. 
What.The.Fuck. 
Mid-way through the cast and crew of La La Land 's acceptance speech, they paused, explained the error, and awarded the Oscar to its rightful owner: Moonlight . 
Image: ABC 
Best Oscars fuck-up ever? 
— Jenna //\\ Wortham (@jennydeluxe) February 27, 2017 Can we check Best Actor again 
— B.J. Novak (@bjnovak) February 27, 2017 MOONLIGHT 
— Jessica Chastain (@jes_chastain) February 27, 2017 congratulations to president hillary clinton 
— nate lee (@nately) February 27, 2017 and the winner is....la la landWAIT 
— 666 piper (@callmiback) February 27, 2017 This was literally me when they announced La La Land and then Moonlight really won pic.twitter.com/9ztFCH8ZNG 
— Matthew A. Cherry (@MatthewACherry) February 27, 2017 OH MY GOD I WAS LITERALLY WRITING MY "MOONLIGHT WAS BEST PIC & EVERYONE KNOWS IT" TWEET WHEN HOLY SHIT A GIFT WAS BESTOWED UNTO US?! #Oscars 
— Lauren Lopez (@LaurenLopez1) February 27, 2017 the best part about this is that la la land had to physically hand the award over to moonlight
